name: Gourmet Pesto Chicken
description: This Gourmet Pesto Chicken recipe is a perfect choice for anyone looking for a delicious, high-protein and low-carb option. Packed with flavors and health benefits, this dish is also low in sodium and sugar, making it a superb pick for a healthy meal. Ideal for those who enjoy healthy yet flavorful dishes.

recipeInstructions.text: Place the chicken fillets on a baking sheet.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Spread the all-purpose pesto evenly over each chicken fillet.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in the preheated oven for 25 minutes or until the chicken is thoroughly cooked.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the chicken from the oven and immediately drizzle with lemon juice before serving.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
